page.title: 16MY SUMMER HOLIDAY
page.content: On Sunday my family and I went to Billing Aquadrome. Billing Aquadrome is a caravan site with a mini fairground.It takes about half an hour to get there.We met our grandad there so he could give us a card to get in free.My sister and I decided to go to the arcade to spend 50p on Invaders and Pinball.I saved 15p to buy a doughnut at the shop next door.I took Â£9.00 with me,so did my sister.We spent about 50p there because it was quite boring going on the same machines every time because most of them were shut down.After that we went back to the caravan and dad,my sister and I went to a few lakes.There are quite a lot of fish there.You are not allowed to fish in some bits of the lakes.
